OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

ocamlnet

  • 3.2.1
  • version 3.5.1
  • 3.6.0
  • 3.6.3
  • 3.6.5
  • 3.7.3
Maintainer contact@ocamlpro.com
Dependencies ocamlfind & pcre-ocaml
Optional dependencies lablgtk | pcre-ocaml | ssl | camlzip = 1.04 | cryptokit
Last update Jun 3, 2013
Source http://download.camlcity.org/download/ocamlnet-3.5.1.tar.gz
9f4f474bfe88496220079e06791ff31c
Statistics Not installed in the last month.

Internet protocols (http, cgi, email etc.) and helper data structures (mail messages, character sets, etc.)

Ocamlnet is an enhanced system platform library for Ocaml. As the name suggests, large parts of it have to do with network programming, but it is actually not restricted to this. Other parts deal with the management of multiple worker processes, and the interaction with other programs running on the same machine. You can also view Ocamlnet as an extension of the system interface as provided by the Unix module of the standard library.
